cdsco_indication: Zygomycosis in patients with disease refractory to other therapy, or patients who are intolerant of other therapy.
fda_indication: Treatment of invasive aspergillosis in adults and pediatric patients 13 years of age and older

cdsco_indication: Febrile Neutropenia in cancer patients.
fda_indication: Treatment of visceral leishmaniasis.

cdsco_indication: Indication for the treatment of progressive neuroendocrine tumours of pancreatic origin (PNET) in patient with unrespectable, locally advanced or metastatic disease.
fda_indication: Treatment of progressive neuroendocrine tumors of pancreatic origin (PNET) in patients with unresectable, locally advanced or metastatic disease.

cdsco_indication: For the treatment of pulmonary arterial hypertension (WHO Group I) in patients with WHO class II or III symptoms to improve exercise capacity and delay clinical worsening.
fda_indication: Treatment of pulmonary arterial hypertension (WHO group I) in patients with WHO class II or III symptoms to improve exercise capacity and delay clinical worsening

cdsco_indication: 1.For the treatment of erectile dysfunction. 2. For the treatment of erectile dysfunction with benign prostatic hyperplasia.
fda_indication: Treatment of pulmonary arterial hypertension (WHO Group I) to improve exercise ability

cdsco_indication: For the treatment of chronic stable angina pectoris in patients with normal sinus rhythm who have a contraindication or intolerance for Beta-blockers.
fda_indication: Corlanor is indicated for the treatment of stable symptomatic heart failure due to dilated cardiomyopathy (DCM) in pediatric patients aged 6 months and older, who are in sinus rhythm with an elevated heart rate.

cdsco_indication: For the treatment of symptomatic orthostatic hypotension.
fda_indication: Treatment of symptomatic orthostatic hypotension.

cdsco_indication: Indicated for adjuvant treatment of Post Menopausal Women with estrogen receptor positive early breast cancer who have received two-three year of tamoxifen and are switched to exemestane for completion of total of five years of adjuvant hormonal therapy.
fda_indication: Treatment of advanced breast cancer in postmenopausal women whose disease has progressed following tamoxifen therapy.

cdsco_indication: Parkinsonism- Indicated in the treatment of Parkinson's disease.
Short stature due to inadequate or failed secretion of pituitary growth hormone.
fda_indication: Treatment of short stature in patients with Noonan syndrome

cdsco_indication: For treatment of moderate to severe dry eye syndrome (keratoconjunctivitis sicca)
fda_indication: Treatment of vernal keratoconjunctivitis (VKC) in children and adults
Reduce the duration of neutropenia and neutropenia sequelae in patients with non-myeloid malignancies undergoing ablative chemotherapy followed by BMT.

cdsco_indication: 1) In newly diagnosed high-grade malignant glioma patients as an adjunct to surgery and radiation. 2) In recurrent glioblastoma multiforme patients as an adjunct to surgery.
fda_indication: As an adjunct to surgery to prolong survival in patients with recurrent glioblastoma multiforme for whom surgical resection is indicated

cdsco_indication: Anti-tuberculosis.
fda_indication: Short-course treatment of tuberculosis.

cdsco_indication: To improve wakefulness in patients with excessive sleepiness associated with treated obstructive sleep apnea (OSA), shift work sleep disorder (SWD) or narcolepsy.
fda_indication: Improve wakefulness in patients with excessive daytime sleepiness associated with narcolepsy.
